definition[0]: the thick central woody stem of a tree
example[0]: He left his bicycle leaning against a tree trunk.
example[1]: the trunk of an old oak tree
definition[1]: the part at the back of a car where you can put bags, tools etc
example[2]: Put your suitcase in the trunk.
definition[2]: the very long nose of an elephant
definition[3]: a piece of clothing like very short trousers, worn by men for swimming
definition[4]: a very large box made of wood or metal, in which clothes, books etc are stored or packed for travel
definition[5]: the main part of your body, not including your head, arms, or legs
